CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Heramba Electric plc is a special-focus company dedicated to the acceleration of decarbonized commercial transportation. Focused on innovation and impactful developments, our vision is to help the world seamlessly shift towards green mobility. Our investments into sustainable, clean energy providers supports Heramba Electrics mission to abate this transportation sectors contribution to global greenhouse gas emissions (GHGs).
